name: Dalhousie Accessibility Week Visual Novel
description:
A visual novel based around Dalhousie University. Showcasing some situations to help the player learn about stereotypes of these "invisible" disabilities: Substance Use, ADHD and Bipolar Disorder.

This project was made from scratch by a team of computer science students from Dalhousie University. It was meant to be a learning experience for Agile Development and meeting big project requirements within a tight deadline of only one semester. This game may be expanded within future iterations or a new game will be posted to our creator page.
